backend/main.mo: Defines all core data models, IDs, and in‑canister state maps for users, bookings, payments, feedback, IVR tasks, and mobile verification.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated source files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human-written summaries for various frontend files for documentation and reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining OKLCH color tokens and CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuring role‑based routes and loading dashboards based on profile and Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permission, offering navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a visual step timeline for booking status progression.
frontend/src/components/feedback/LeaveRa: Component for submitting star ratings and comments for a booking.
frontend/src/components/ivr/IvrUpdatesPa: Displays IVR task updates linked to a specific booking.
AppShell renders the main layout with role‑based navigation and handles logout by clearing identity and queries.
frontend/src/components/verification/Mob: Component for requesting and verifying mobile OTPs, showing a demo OTP and submitting verification via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identities, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, bookings, services, verification, and other backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme tokens and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays booking status counts and navigation links to various admin management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BookingAllocati: Lists unassigned bookings and allows admins to assign staff using principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/IVRSettingsPage: Provides a simple local-storage-based form to configure IVR provider settings in demo mode.
frontend/src/pages/admin/IVRTasksPage.ts: Shows IVR call tasks and lets admins update each task’s status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ManageServicesP: Manages service categories and subscription plans with forms to create new entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentsPage.ts: Displays payment records and includes tools to record new payments and update payment statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SupportAndFeedb: Displays all support tickets and customer feedback using query hooks, listing entries with status, message, and rating.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UsersPage.tsx: Aggregates unique customers and staff from bookings and displays their IDs in separate panels.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Shows a confirmation message and booking ID after a service is booked, with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingDetai: Displays detailed booking info, status timeline, IVR updates, and rating option for completed bookings.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookServiceP: Provides a form for verified users to book a service category with address and time slot, creating a booking via mutation.
Lists service categories and subscription plans, linking users to booking or subscription pages.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Shows quick links to services, bookings, subscriptions, and support, plus a preview of upcoming bookings.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MyBookingsPa: Displays the user's bookings, separating upcoming and historical items, with navigation to booking details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/Subscription: Shows subscription plans fetched from the backend and allows users to subscribe in demo mode.
Lets users submit support tickets and view their existing tickets.
frontend/src/pages/shared/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/shared/ProfileSetupPa: Allows users to complete and save their profile information, including role and mobile verification.
Displays detailed information about a specific booking and allows assigned staff to update its status.
Shows staff their assigned jobs, today's tasks, and links to their schedule.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffJobsPage.t: Displays all bookings assigned to the logged-in staff member and links to job detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffSchedulePa: Shows a table of confirmed or in-progress bookings for the logged-in staff member as their schedule.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash segments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, requirements, and image assets for a multi-module service booking platform.
